translation.en: [woman] When I was a kid, it was, like, have you ever had Lucky Charms,
translation.zh: ‎我小时候 如果有幸运符麦片

translation.en: and you pour out the Lucky Charms  and you get, like, a bowl of cereal and three marshmallows,
translation.zh:
‎你倒出来 会有一碗麦片
‎和三个棉花糖

translation.en: That's what it felt like to me,  that there were three Asian-American marshmallows.
translation.zh:
‎这就是我的感觉
‎有三个亚裔美国人棉花糖

translation.en: The Yellow Ranger in Power Rangers...
translation.zh: ‎《金刚战士》里有个黄色战士

translation.en: The Yellow Power Ranger...
translation.zh: ‎那个黄色战士

translation.en: Data from The Goonies was one of my favorites. Margaret Cho on All-American Girl...
translation.zh:
‎-我最喜欢《七宝奇谋》的百科
‎-《全美女孩》里的玛格丽特·周

translation.en: Michelle Kwan in figure skating. I thought maybe Lois Lane could be mixed race,
translation.zh:
‎-花样滑冰的关颖珊
‎-我认为露易丝·莱恩可能是混血儿

translation.en: -like I am. -Captain Planet.
translation.zh:
‎-像我一样
‎-《地球超人》

translation.en: [interviewer] Captain Planet is Asian?
translation.zh: ‎《地球超人》是亚洲的？

translation.en: Not Asian, but there was an Asian character
translation.zh:
‎《地球超人》不是
‎但里面有一个亚裔角色

translation.en: who had a dolphin friend.
translation.zh: ‎她有一个海豚朋友

translation.en: The Baby-Sitters Club is a series of books that came out in the 80's and 90's.
translation.zh:
‎《保姆俱乐部》是在
‎八‎、‎九十年代出版的一系列书籍

translation.en: [Sarah Kuhn] It follows a group of 13-year-old middle schoolers  who are friends
translation.zh:
‎故事围绕一群13岁的中学生展开
‎他们彼此之间都是朋友

translation.en: and they decide to form a business
translation.zh: ‎他们决定帮社区里的本地孩子

translation.en: by babysitting the local kids in their neighborhood.
translation.zh: ‎提供保姆服务来进行创业

translation.en: They're really concerned about, um, quality child care...
translation.zh: ‎他们非常关注有品质的儿童看护

translation.en: which now seems, um...
translation.zh:
‎现在来看 他们的热情所在是
‎照看孩子

translation.en: a little odd that they-- that was like their passion: babysitting.
translation.zh:
‎现在来看 他们的热情所在是
‎照看孩子 ‎这有点奇怪

translation.en: There's always a new incident or adventure.
translation.zh: ‎总会有新的事件或冒险发生

translation.en: There's fun drama. There's boy drama, of course.
translation.zh: ‎有搞笑的情节 当然也会有感情风波

translation.en: Stacey's going through an issue with her dad.
translation.zh: ‎斯泰西和她爸爸遇到这种问题

translation.en: What's this jealousy when you think Mary has a new best friend?
translation.zh:
‎当你认为玛丽有了新好友时
‎那种嫉妒的情绪是什么？

translation.en: Going shopping, babysitting, spending time with her friends,
translation.zh: ‎去购物 照料孩子 和她的朋友一起玩

translation.en: going on cruises to Disney World.
translation.zh: ‎坐游轮去迪士尼世界

translation.en: The Baby-Sitters Club was my childhood.
translation.zh: ‎《保姆俱乐部》是我的童年

translation.en: I had... not only a really big collection of Baby-Sitters Club books at home,
translation.zh:
‎我不仅在家收集了
‎大量保姆俱乐部的书

translation.en: I also would check them out at the library periodically
translation.zh: ‎我还会定期去图书馆借阅

translation.en: and even, like, check out old favorites.
translation.zh: ‎甚至会去借阅以前的最爱

translation.en: I voraciously read through a good chunk,
translation.zh: ‎我如饥似渴地看了一大段

translation.en: primarily through the Scholastic Book Club orders.
translation.zh: ‎主要是通过学乐教育的读书会订单

translation.en: [sighs] Y'all know what that is, I mean...
translation.zh: ‎你们都知道那是什么

translation.en: I was reading them. My friends were reading them.
translation.zh: ‎我有看那些书 我所有朋友都看过

translation.en: Once I got into it, it was like... drugs for me.
translation.zh: ‎一旦开始看 对我来说就像吸毒

translation.en: We've got the sleeping bag.
translation.zh: ‎我们有睡袋

translation.en: I've got a bag. Um, I had a necklace.
translation.zh: ‎我有一个袋子 一条项链

translation.en: I had t-shirts. There were dolls.
translation.zh: ‎我有T恤 有玩偶

translation.en: I had a CD-ROM game.
translation.zh: ‎我有一个光盘游戏

translation.en: I spent many hours on it.
translation.zh: ‎我玩了很长时间

translation.en: We would call each other by those character names.
translation.zh: ‎我们用人物名字称呼彼此

translation.en: We would try to dress like those characters.
translation.zh: ‎我们会尽量像角色一样穿衣打扮

translation.en: Of course I was Claudia.
translation.zh: ‎当然我是克劳迪娅

translation.en: "Suddenly, I sat up. All I could think about
translation.zh: ‎“突然 我坐起来 我只能想到

translation.en: were Milky Way bars and Ring-Dings and Oreos.
translation.zh:
‎星河巧克力和巧克力蛋糕
‎还有奥利奥

translation.en: Those were going to be the subject of my next art project.
translation.zh: ‎那些将是我下一个艺术项目的主题

translation.en: I could see it so clearly, the series of pop art pieces:
translation.zh:
‎我很清楚地看到
‎这一系列普普艺术作品

translation.en: 'Junk-Food Fantasy by Claudia Kishi.'
translation.zh: ‎克劳迪娅·岸的《垃圾食品幻想》

translation.en: The idea was brilliant. I couldn't wait to get started."
translation.zh: ‎这个主意太棒了 我等不及马上开始”

translation.en: [Phil Yu] Claudia Kishi is vice president of The Baby-Sitters Club.
translation.zh: ‎克劳迪娅·岸是保姆俱乐部的副总裁

translation.en: She's also Japanese American.
translation.zh: ‎她同样是日裔美国人

translation.en: She loves junk food. She loves art.
translation.zh: ‎她喜欢垃圾食品 她喜欢艺术

translation.en: Kooky, eclectic, and... ahead of her time.
translation.zh: ‎古怪 不拘一格 超前于她的时代

translation.en: I loved that she had hollowed-out books.
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢她把书挖空

translation.en: I feel like that's something I still want, is, like, hollowed-out books to-- to hide all of my candy.
translation.zh:
‎那仍然是我想做的事
‎挖空书本来藏我的糖

translation.en: [Yumi Sakugawa] She's cool enough to have her own landline in her bedroom,
translation.zh:
‎她很酷 可以在自己的卧室
‎有固定电话

translation.en: unheard of when you're a 13-year-old girl.
translation.zh: ‎对13岁的年纪来说简直闻所未闻

translation.en: Usually... um, the Asian character or the woman of color character
translation.zh:
‎通常来说 亚裔角色或
‎有色人种女性角色

translation.en: is the one you feel like you have to be, right?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得你会做那种人 对吗？

translation.en: If you're playing Harry Potter, you have to be Cho Chang.
translation.zh:
‎如果要参演《哈利波特》
‎你必须是张秋

translation.en: Whereas I feel like Claudia is the one  everyone seems to want to be.
translation.zh: ‎但我觉得每个人都想成为克劳迪娅

translation.en: "I love to dress in a way that some people
translation.zh: ‎“我喜欢穿一些 斯通布鲁克的人

translation.en: here in Stoneybrook might call...
translation.zh: ‎“我喜欢穿一些 斯通布鲁克的人 ‎会觉得无法接受的衣服”

translation.en: outrageous."
translation.zh: ‎会觉得无法接受的衣服”

translation.en: "At the moment I'm wearing lavender plaid cuffed pants
translation.zh: ‎“现在我穿的是淡紫色格子…

translation.en: with suspenders..." "White tights with clocks on them."
translation.zh:
‎-翻边吊带裤”
‎-“有时钟图案的白色紧身裤”

translation.en: "I was wearing a man's paisley vest I found at a yard sale..."
translation.zh:
‎“我穿着在旧货市场找到的
‎男装佩斯里背心”

translation.en: "Huge pretend emeralds..." "Electric pink ankle boots."
translation.zh:
‎-“巨大的假翡翠”
‎-“萤光粉红短靴”

translation.en: "I've got earrings shaped like Christmas tree lights
translation.zh: ‎“我还有像圣诞树灯造型的耳环

translation.en: that blink on and off."
translation.zh: ‎上面的灯甚至可以开关”

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: ‎噢 我的天

translation.en: "Was it too much? I shook my head.
translation.zh: ‎“是不是太过分了？我摇了摇头

translation.en: I looked great."
translation.zh: ‎我看起来很棒”

translation.en: [Sarah Kuhn] Claudia's style to me is very, like, tween girl meets Asian auntie.
translation.zh:
‎在我看来 克劳迪娅的风格
‎很像少女遇见亚洲阿姨

translation.en: I feel like Claudia... knew what hipster fashion was gonna be 20 years later.
translation.zh:
‎似乎克劳迪娅知道20年后的
‎潮人时尚是怎样的

translation.en: For an Asian American, or any woman of color character,
translation.zh:
‎对于亚裔美国人
‎或任何有色人种女性角色而言

translation.en: to be the cool one is so unusual.
translation.zh: ‎做一个很酷的人 这并不多见

translation.en: She is just a really awesome character
translation.zh: ‎她是一个非常棒的角色

translation.en: who I felt like kind of busted through all the model minority stereotypes.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得她打破了
‎那些对少数族裔的典型成见

translation.en: "My family is conservative, but I'm wild.
translation.zh: ‎“我的家庭很保守 但我很狂野

translation.en: My sister and I have next to nothing in common.
translation.zh: ‎我的姐姐和我几乎没有相似之处

translation.en: She's super smart and likes school.
translation.zh: ‎她非常聪明和喜欢上学

translation.en: My parents think she's wonderful.
translation.zh: ‎我父母认为她很完美

translation.en: I wouldn't admit this to just anybody,
translation.zh: ‎我不会对任何人承认这‎一‎点

translation.en: but I have a feeling  that I'm a big disappointment to my parents."
translation.zh:
‎但我有一种感觉
‎我父母对我非常失望”

translation.en: That was such a mood.
translation.zh: ‎那种心情

translation.en: That's like...  That was such a, like... a big mood for, like--
translation.zh: ‎那真的是…强烈的情绪

translation.en: This is why I related to Claudia so much.
translation.zh: ‎我对克劳迪娅感情这么深的原因

translation.en: Janine is like the kind of daughter that every...
translation.zh: ‎珍妮是那种每个家庭都想要的女儿

translation.en: that I felt that, like,  my mom would've wanted, and I was definitely not.
translation.zh: ‎我母亲想要的那种 而我则不是

translation.en: And I... would constantly... have this specter of... the perfect daughter...
translation.zh:
‎我会经常被这个
‎完美女儿的阴影所笼罩

translation.en: kind of... hanging over me  'cause I felt very aware that I was not this person.
translation.zh: ‎因为我很清楚 我不是这个人

translation.en: I felt like Claudia.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得自己像克劳迪娅

translation.en: I wanted to follow my heart and do creative things.
translation.zh:
‎我想听从内心的声音
‎做一些有创意的事

translation.en: I wanted to do art. I wanted to draw. I wanted to write.
translation.zh: ‎我想做艺术 我想画画 我想写作

translation.en: Claudia was so... unapologetic about... who she was.
translation.zh:
‎克劳迪娅对自己的本性
‎没有感到局促不安

translation.en: She really showed that you could be an artist, that you could be creative.
translation.zh:
‎她真的证明了 你可以做艺术家
‎你可以有创造力

translation.en: Claudia Kishi was this role model that just... hit me exactly right.
translation.zh:
‎克劳迪娅·岸是我的榜样
‎给了我很大的启发

translation.en: Like, "Oh, this is like a puzzle piece that fits right into my heart."
translation.zh: ‎就像一块刚好填补我内心的拼图

translation.en: "'The Lowells are prejudiced,' said Kristy in a rush.
translation.zh:
‎“洛厄尔家的人有偏见
‎克里斯蒂匆忙说道

translation.en: 'Claud, they didn't like you because you're Japanese.
translation.zh: ‎克劳迪 你是日本人 他们不喜欢你

translation.en: Jessi, Mrs. Lowell wouldn't even let you in her house because you're African-American.'
translation.zh:
‎杰西 洛厄尔太太不会让你进家门
‎因为你是非裔美国人

translation.en: My mouth dropped open.  I could feel my hands trembling and my cheeks burning.
translation.zh:
‎我张大了嘴巴
‎我感到我的手在颤抖 脸颊发烫

translation.en: 'That's-- That's not fair!'"
translation.zh: ‎那不公平！”

translation.en: Congratulations, Claudia.
translation.zh: ‎恭喜你 克劳迪娅

translation.en: You just learned a few things about good old-fashioned racism.
translation.zh: ‎你刚刚了解到何谓旧式的种族主义

translation.en: I thought about the cover of "Keep Out, Claudia!"
translation.zh: ‎我想到了“克劳迪娅 别进来”的封面

translation.en: and I remember, like, it was her standing outside the door
translation.zh: ‎我记得她站在门外

translation.en: with these Trump-looking white kids
translation.zh:
‎三个特朗普式的白人小孩
‎用批判的眼光看着她

translation.en: looking at her judgingly. I thought it was like,
translation.zh:
‎三个特朗普式的白人小孩
‎用批判的眼光看着她 ‎我想 会否这些封面是真实的？

translation.en: "What if these covers were really truthful?"
translation.zh: ‎我想 会否这些封面是真实的？

translation.en: I just thought, like, it'd be a great way to talk about some microaggressions.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得 这是谈及微侵害很好的方式

translation.en: Things that Asians have to deal with every day,
translation.zh: ‎这些小事亚洲人每天都会遇到

translation.en: that Claudia probably would have to deal with, but they never addressed in the books.
translation.zh:
‎跟克劳迪娅是一样的
‎但在书里完全没提到

translation.en: There is definitely that quality of... um...
translation.zh: ‎绝对有…

translation.en: I guess, othering, for sure, where that a lot of these stories are being told
translation.zh:
‎我想其他的 就像你应该理解
‎很多这种故事 ‎都是从白人女孩的角度讲述的

translation.en: from the perspectives of young white girls.
translation.zh: ‎都是从白人女孩的角度讲述的

translation.en: They, you know, somewhat problematically made a point to describe her
translation.zh: ‎他们的描述方式总是很有问题

translation.en: as always having almond-shaped eyes and... um...
translation.zh: ‎像是形容她有杏仁般的眼睛

translation.en: jet-black hair  and super beautiful skin, even though she eats tons of junk food.
translation.zh:
‎乌黑的头发和超好的皮肤
‎尽管她吃很多垃圾食品

translation.en: [Phil] First time I read someone described as "almond-shaped eyes."
translation.zh: ‎那是我第一次看到 杏仁般的眼睛

translation.en: And I was like, "What does that even mean?"
translation.zh: ‎我说 那究竟什么意思？

translation.en: In terms of racial representation it definitely, like...
translation.zh: ‎就种族代表性来说 这肯定是

translation.en: How do I put this? I noticed that-- most of the people were white.
translation.zh:
‎我要怎么说？
‎我注意到大部分人是白人

translation.en: [CB Lee] When you don't see yourself in media, when you don't see mirrors of yourself,
translation.zh:
‎当你在媒体上看不到自己
‎看不到自己的镜像

translation.en: you go on thinking, "I'm broken," or... "I'm not normal," or "I don't exist."
translation.zh:
‎你会想 我有缺陷 我不正常
‎或者我不存在

translation.en: These thoughts,  they're kind of subconscious, but they, um...
translation.zh: ‎这些想法是潜意识的 但是它们…

translation.en: They're pervasive, especially when you go on thinking that the world...
translation.zh:
‎它们无处不在
‎尤其是当你在想这个世界…

translation.en: is-- When you perceive the world... as a world without you in it.
translation.zh: ‎当你认为这个世界没有你存在的时候

translation.en: I remember, um,  the person with the really heavy cartoonish accent.
translation.zh: ‎我记得那个带着浓重卡通口音的人

translation.en: And a lot of disposable side characters and things like that that.
translation.zh: ‎类似的很多无关紧要的配角和东西

translation.en: That sort of generalized sense of being
translation.zh: ‎这种在媒体中被排斥的

translation.en: othered in media,
translation.zh: ‎普遍感觉

translation.en: of being the perpetual foreigner, of never being American.
translation.zh: ‎永远是外国人 永远不是美国人

translation.en: And I do remember that manifesting in school
translation.zh:
‎我记得在学校里的事情
‎说明了这一点

translation.en: with every kid asking me where I was from, um,
translation.zh: ‎所有的孩子都问我从哪里来

translation.en: or pulling their eyes back to sort of, like,  make fun of me.
translation.zh: ‎他们会拉眼角来取笑我

translation.en: So, I definitely remember, um, how it affected me in real life.
translation.zh:
‎我清楚地记得这在现实生活
‎对我的影响

translation.en: As someone who grew up, like, with-- with a Thai mom and a white dad, um,
translation.zh:
‎作为一个有泰国妈妈和
‎白人爸爸的孩子

translation.en: the Asian narratives I saw didn't always jive with my experience,
translation.zh:
‎那些我看到的亚洲故事
‎跟我的经历并无相似之处

translation.en: which contributed to my questions of identity.
translation.zh: ‎这导致我对个人身份的疑问

translation.en: So, seeing someone like Claudia,
translation.zh:
‎看到像克劳迪娅这样的人
‎她在走自己的路

translation.en: who was kind of forging her own path, definitely
translation.zh:
‎看到像克劳迪娅这样的人
‎她在走自己的路 ‎毫无疑问帮助我
‎更好地和自我身份建立联系

translation.en: helped me feel more connected to, um, my own identity.
translation.zh:
‎毫无疑问帮助我
‎更好地和自我身份建立联系

translation.en: Just knowing there's not one way to be an Asian person.
translation.zh: ‎知道亚洲人并不只是有一个模子

translation.en: I can just be me and that's fine.
translation.zh: ‎我可以做自己 那没问题

translation.en: "I pulled out my box of 64 Crayola crayons with the sharpener.
translation.zh:
‎“我拿出我一盒64支的
‎克雷奥拉蜡笔和铅笔刀

translation.en: I sighed with happiness, and then I began to draw.
translation.zh: ‎我高兴地叹了口气 然后开始画画

translation.en: My beautiful butterfly was finished."
translation.zh: ‎我漂亮的蝴蝶画好了”

translation.en: "'Claudia!' Said Miss Packet sternly.
translation.zh: ‎“克劳迪娅 帕婕老师严厉地喊道

translation.en: 'Is this some kind of joke?'
translation.zh: ‎这是开什么玩笑吗？”

translation.en: I could not answer her. If I had, I would have cried."
translation.zh:
‎我无法回答她 如果我这样做
‎我会哭的

translation.en: So, Mimi hears about this incident. Mimi, of course, this...
translation.zh:
‎然后 嫲嫲听说了这件事
‎嫲嫲 当然了

translation.en: awesome grandma who totally gets Claudia,
translation.zh: ‎了不起的 能理解克劳迪娅的奶奶

translation.en: who embraces Claudia's artsy side, and she's not gonna let this slide.
translation.zh:
‎她喜爱克劳迪娅的艺术气质
‎她不会坐视这个事

translation.en: So she goes up to the teacher.
translation.zh: ‎所以她去找老师

translation.en: "She said, 'Miss Packet,
translation.zh: ‎她说 ”帕婕老师

translation.en: I would like you please to respect my Claudia's intelligence and imagination.
translation.zh:
‎我希望你能尊重克劳迪娅的
‎智慧和想象力

translation.en: You asked the children to draw themselves the way they see themselves,
translation.zh: ‎你让孩子们画出他们眼中的自己

translation.en: and my Claudia sees herself as a free spirit, like a butterfly.
translation.zh:
‎我的克劳迪娅认为自己是自由的精灵
‎就像蝴蝶一样

translation.en: So, that is what she drew.'"
translation.zh: ‎所以她就画了”

translation.en: Mic drop! Fuck, yes!
translation.zh: ‎扔下话筒 该死的 就这样

translation.en: [laughs] Sorry, I didn't mean to swear. Um...
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 我不是故意骂人的

translation.en: Go, Mimi.
translation.zh: ‎上吧 嫲嫲

translation.en: It was such a beautiful story, especially... since Asian American... children,
translation.zh:
‎这是非常美好的故事
‎尤其因为亚裔美国孩子

translation.en: they grow up being told by their elders to-- to not stand out too much,
translation.zh:
‎成长时长辈会教育他们
‎不要太突出

translation.en: to not create waves, to fit in with the crowd.
translation.zh: ‎不要制造风波 要融入人群
